Articles.Content: The music starting at 3:25 ... sound familiar?

Hmm... It does sound familiar. I don't know where I heard it, though.

Perhaps it was in ArmA II?
The music is for public use. I've heard KSP songs in several places already. It's a little jarring, I'll admit.

The music is for public use. I've heard KSP songs in several places already. It's a little jarring, I'll admit.

That I did not know.

They should pony up for some some professionally done unique music which they would own. Doesn't one of the devs make tracks?

That I did not know.

Yeah its Kevin McLeod. He is all over the internet with 26 bajillion free tunes for everyone to use.

There have been nights where I've spent many hours in the VAB alone, so hearing that music, plus some of the other songs, gives me a mix of happiness/excitement and a mix of feeling like i have a pit in my stomach+regret... sometimes just hearing the music makes me want to get back into the game again.
Everyone uses Kevin McLeod music becuase its free and royallty free!' Praise kevin Kerman.
Sounds like Sneaky Adventure by Kevin MacLeod.
